txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Enemy forces have renewed their assault upon the northern Thing-fold!</rgb>
Battle at the Lofts
Talk to Agátur the Boastful
'The Welkin-lofts of Gundabad are under attack! The forces there must be defeated if we are to keep our hold on Gundabad!\n\n'Will you travel there and see this threat banished?'
<rgb=#00ff00>Ulshatarg has fallen!</rgb>
<rgb=#00ff00>Grazmauk has fallen!</rgb>
Agátur the Boastful can be found at Zidir-nesad, The Steepset in Máttugard.\n\nYou should talk to Agátur the Boastful and enter the fray in order to complete some of his tasks.
<rgb=#FF0000>Enemy forces have renewed their assault upon the northern Mootfold!</rgb>
'Go and protect the Welkin-lofts!'
'You have dealt a mighty blow to our enemies! They had better not try anything like that again or they shall surely meet the same fate!'
Complete Quest 'Battle at the Lofts: Hobgoblins and Angmarim'
A planned assault against enemy forces at the Welkin-lofts is underway, but the battle will not be won without additional reinforcements.
Complete Quest 'Battle at the Lofts: Cold-drakes'
<rgb=#FF0000>The terrible Grazmauk has entered the fray!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>The terrible Grazmauk has entered the fray!</rgb>
Complete Quest 'Battle at the Lofts: Frost-tusks'
You should return to Agátur the Boastful and apprise him of your efforts.
<rgb=#00ff00>Grazmauk has fallen!</rgb>
Complete Quest 'Battle at the Lofts: Ulshatarg'
<rgb=#FF0000>The terrible Ulshatarg has entered the fray!</rgb>
Complete Quest 'Battle at the Lofts: Grazmauk'
<rgb=#00ff00>Ulshatarg has fallen!</rgb>
